name: Ahoy
description:
Have you ever wanted to be a real pirate and trouble the water with your own ship and crew? Join Captain Seadog in his journey to find the most valuable treasures in the lost islands of Skeleton sea, fight with sea monsters like “walking lobsters”, “walking sharks” and “starfish”. Join the crew of 5 slouchy people and the famous wolf of the sea - Captain Seadog, to fight the monsters and find some GOLD!!!

Warning: the game contains bad language and violence. and is not for kids.

---------------Release History---------------

v0.5 released on 14 Aug 2022

v0.4 released on 22 July 2022

v0.3 released on 8 July 2022

v0.2 released on 10 June 2022
